Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Adverse Event Associated with the Kidney and Genitourinary System
Record.Description: Inflammation of the URINARY BLADDER, either from bacterial or non-bacterial causes. Cystitis is usually associated with painful urination (dysuria), increased frequency, urgency, and suprapubic pain.
